ing: 2 (3 ounce) packages apricot flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (8.75 ounce) can apricot halves, drained and chopped
1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This light and airy dessert is sure to please. It's delicious and refreshing...perfect for summer but great anytime!!"
ins: Pour the apricot nectar into a saucepan and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stir in gelatin mix until completely dissolved. Whisk in sour cream until smooth or process in a blender. Pour into a serving bowl, and stir in the apricots. Chill until set, about 3 hours. Top with whipped topping just before serving.
